sentence_zh_TW: 他對外國文化的熱情使他想學習多種語言，並深入了解不同的習俗。
sentence: His passion for ______ cultures drives him to learn multiple languages and understand different customs.

sentence_zh_TW: 她剛滿十六歲，這對她來說是一個重要的生日，標誌著青少年生活的開始。
sentence: She just turned ______, marking an important birthday that signifies the start of her teenage years.

sentence_zh_TW: 她的裙子非常漂亮，有很多顏色和圖案，讓她在派對上看起來引人注目。
sentence: Her dress is very ______, with many colors and patterns that make her stand out at the party.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這場比賽中，選手們的表現非常接近，有些人甚至可以平起平坐。
sentence: In this competition, the players are performing very close, and some are so good that they can be ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 我最喜歡的故事都是由我的祖母告訴我的，她會在冬天的晚上坐在壁爐前講這些故事。
sentence: My favorite stories are all told by my ______, who sits by the fireplace in winter nights sharing them.

sentence_zh_TW: 她用一根可愛的別針把圍巾固定住，這樣她在風中也不會感到寒冷。
sentence: She used a cute ______ to secure her scarf, so she wouldn't feel cold in the wind.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個房間裡，請你在桌子上放下那本書，這樣我們就可以開始討論內容了。
sentence: In this room, please ______ that book on the table so we can start discussing the content.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個動物園裡，有許多不同的動物，它們各自都有獨特的特徵和栖息地。
sentence: At this zoo, there are many different ______, each with its unique characteristics and habitats.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位偉大的音樂家在全世界享有盛譽，作品被不同的文化廣泛讚譽。
sentence: This ______ musician is renowned worldwide, and his works are widely praised across different cultures.

sentence_zh_TW: 在我們的會議上，各方達成了一項重要協議，以促進未來的合作計劃。
sentence: During our meeting, all parties reached an important ______ to facilitate future collaborative plans.

sentence_zh_TW: 那條街道的沿線有許多商店和餐廳，是當地居民最喜愛的聚會場所。
sentence: The ______ lined with many shops and restaurants is the favorite gathering place for local residents.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個活動中，參與者的反饋非常好，很多人都表示他們會推薦給朋友。
sentence: The feedback from participants in this event is very ______, with many stating they would recommend it to friends.

sentence_zh_TW: 在熱帶雨林中，有許多不同種類的蛇蜿蜒穿行，令人感到既神秘又恐懼。
sentence: In the tropical rainforest, many different types of ______ slither through the trees, evoking both mystery and fear.

sentence_zh_TW: 一年中的某些時候，這個公園會舉辦各種活動，吸引了成千上萬的人前來參加。
sentence: At certain times of the year, this park hosts various events that attract thousands of people to attend ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 在炎熱的夏天，正午的陽光會讓人感到非常刺眼，大家通常會選擇避開這個時候出門。
sentence: During the hot summer days, the sunlight at ______ can be very blinding, and people usually choose to avoid going out at this time.

sentence_zh_TW: 她的事業非常成功，因為她總是努力工作並設定高目標來挑戰自己。
sentence: Her career is very ______ because she always works hard and sets high goals to challenge herself.

sentence_zh_TW: 他的愛好是畫畫，每當他有時間，就會找個寧靜的地方專心創作。
sentence: His ______ is painting, and whenever he has time, he finds a quiet place to focus on his creations.

sentence_zh_TW: 在我的聚會上，我準備了一道美味的火腿，它的味道和香氣讓客人們都讚不絕口。
sentence: At my party, I prepared a delicious ______ whose taste and aroma left the guests raving.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這家公司裡，管理層正在計劃進行一些改變，以提升員工的工作效率和滿意度。
sentence: Within this company, the management is planning to make some ______ to improve employee efficiency and satisfaction.

sentence_zh_TW: 在生活中，我們會面對許多挑戰，但正是這些挑戰讓我們成長和進步。
sentence: In life, we will ______ many challenges, but it is these challenges that help us grow and improve.
